dataset-metadata.title: GHG Emissions (FRG, Federal, 1990-2016)
dataset-metadata.reference-and-citation: German Federal Environmental Agency (Umweltbundesamt, Nationale Trendtabellen, Stand Januar 2019, inklusive diffuse CO2-Emissionen aus Brennstoffen)
dataset-metadata.data-details-and-limitations: Data contains CO2, CH4 and N2O. CH4 emmisions calcaulated with a GWP value of 25, N2O emmissions converted in CO2 equivalents by application of GWP value of 298 (GWP = Global Warming Potential). Not containing process based CO2 emissions: Bavaria, Lower Saxony until 2008; Brandenburg, Hamburg, North-Rhine Westfalia for 1990; Saarland, Saxony until 1999; Thuringia.

dataset-metadata.title: CO2 Emission of Primary Energy Consumption (FRG, Federal, 1990-2017)
dataset-metadata.dataset-description: Energiebedingte CO2-Emissionen aus dem Primärenergieverbrauch*) 1990 – 2017 nach Bundesländern
dataset-metadata.reference-and-citation: German Federal Environmental Agency (Länderarbeitskreis Energiebilanzen (Stand: 25.07.2019), für die Länder Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Saarland, Sachsen-Anhalt und Thüringen (Stand: 05.03.2019); für Deutschlandwerte Umweltbundesamt, Nationale Trendtabellen (NIR), Stand Januar 2019)
dataset-metadata.data-details-and-limitations: Not including emissions resulting of international air traffic, including emissions for exported electricity, no emissions for imported electricity. Data in current area preliminary. Data includes combustion emission.
